event.title: called because this was the main thoroughfare to the airport in the early years

data.event: Prominent highways include State Highway 121 and State Highway 183, also known as Airport Freeway (a reference to the Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport, so called because this was the main thoroughfare to the airport in the early years of its history).
The City of Bedford, Texas Home Rule Charter was adopted September 24, 1966.
